CUserCmd/ClearButtons.description: Removes all keys from the command. Doesn't prevent movement, see

CUserCmd/ClearMovement.description: Clears the movement from the command.

CUserCmd/CommandNumber.description: Returns an increasing number representing the index of the user cmd. The value returned is occasionally 0 inside

CUserCmd/GetButtons.description: Returns a bitflag indicating which buttons are pressed.

CUserCmd/GetForwardMove.description: The speed the client wishes to move forward with, negative if the clients wants to move backwards.

CUserCmd/GetImpulse.description: Gets the current impulse from the client, usually 0.

CUserCmd/GetMouseWheel.description: Returns the scroll delta as whole number.

CUserCmd/GetMouseX.description: Returns the delta of the angular horizontal mouse movement of the player.

CUserCmd/GetMouseY.description: Returns the delta of the angular vertical mouse movement of the player.

CUserCmd/GetSideMove.description: The speed the client wishes to move sideways with, positive if it wants to move right, negative if it wants to move left.

CUserCmd/GetUpMove.description: The speed the client wishes to move up with, negative if the clients wants to move down.

CUserCmd/GetViewAngles.description: Gets the direction the player is looking in.

CUserCmd/IsForced.description: When players are not sending usercommands to the server (often due to lag), their last usercommand will be executed multiple times as a backup. This function returns true if that is happening.

CUserCmd/KeyDown.description: Returns true if the specified button(s) is pressed.

CUserCmd/RemoveKey.description: Removed a key bit from the current key bitflag.

CUserCmd/SelectWeapon.description: Forces the associated player to select a weapon.

CUserCmd/SetForwardMove.description: Sets speed the client wishes to move forward with, negative if the clients wants to move backwards.

CUserCmd/SetImpulse.description: Sets the impulse to be send together with the command.

CUserCmd/SetMouseX.description: Sets the delta of the angular horizontal mouse movement of the player.

CUserCmd/SetMouseY.description: Sets the delta of the angular vertical mouse movement of the player.

CUserCmd/SetSideMove.description: Sets speed the client wishes to move sidewards with, positive to move right, negative to move left.

CUserCmd/SetUpMove.description: Sets speed the client wishes to move upwards with, negative to move down.

CUserCmd/SetViewAngles.description: Sets the direction the client wants to move in.

CUserCmd/TickCount.description: Returns tick count since joining the server. This will always return 0 for bots.
